info.title: Stats API for the Battlefield series
info.description:
This project also has a Discord bot, allowing anyone in your server to check their Battlefield stats via simple commands.

Language tags (lang) for both Battlefield 1 and Battlefield 5 are based on Java 8 language tags. (response keys do not change based on the language tags, only the values do).

Data for Battlefield 2 is retrieved from the two revive projects: BF2Hub and PlayBF2.

Data for Battlefield 2142 is retrieved from the BF2142 Reclamation project.

All other titles are still managed by EA/Dice.

If you discover any issues or have suggestions for new features, post them in the Community Network Discord: discord.gg/zMuxW6c.

If you want to support the project, consider becoming a sponsor on GitHub.

get.summary: Get stats from the given player for bf3
get.description:
Available options for platform: pc, ps3, xbox360.

for nametypes you only have to fill in one of them: name (normal playername), or playerid (same as id in what it returns - fastest method).

if you dont know what you need to use, just use 'name', just fill the playername in there: **/stats/?name=iiTzArcur&platform=pc

parameters.name: format_values

schema.description: If precentage values have to be returned as string, example: '50%' (enabled by default for backwards compatability)

get.summary: Get a list of servers based on given name
get.description:
The regions available are: all (all regions), eu, asia, nam (north america), sam (south america), au (Australia) or oc (Oceana).
                    For platform there is pc, xboxone and ps4 (cache of 10 seconds)
                    Limit is the max amount of servers it will gather, give it a number between 1 and 100.
                    For player filter you can use oneToFive, sixToTen, tenPlus or none, comma seperated list is also a option example: "&player_filters=onetofive,sixtoten" to filter on the amount of free slots.
                    Same for gamemode filter as with player filter but with the name of the gamemode

parameters.name: name

schema.description: Name of the server you want to search for
schema.title: Name

parameters.description: Name of the server you want to search for

parameters.name: platform

schema.description: Platform of the server you want to search for
schema.title: Platform

parameters.description: Platform of the server you want to search for

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of servers to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of servers to return

200.description: serverlist based on given name

404.description: if something went wrong getting the serverlist
